PDF

Metadata

  1. Determine file type:

    $ file -p <INPUT-FILE.pdf>

  2. View file metadata:

    $ pdfinfo [-isodates] <INPUT-FILE.pdf>

Extract

Images

  1. List images in PDF:

    $ pdfimages -list <INPUT-FILE.pdf>

  2. Extract images with image name prefix <NAME-PREFIX>-NNN.xxx:

    $ pdfimages -all <INPUT-FILE.PDF> <NAME-PREFIX>
